| HistoryText             = 
The Derangers began as patients of [[Lionel Jeffries (Earth-616)|Scramble]] but were released by Aurora. They were later tracked down by Bedlam, who took control of them, using his mental abilities. He used them to fight Alpha Flight, but they turned on him. Bedlam then slaughtered all of them save Laura Dean and Goblyn.
